casebody.data:
David G. KOGUT
v.
Joanne ROSENFELD. No. 306A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 13, 2004. Frederick K. Sharpless, Eugene E. Lester, III, Greensboro, for Rosenfeld. Robert A. Lefkowitz, Winston-Salem, for Kogut.

Prior report: 157 N.C.App. 487, 579 S.E.2d 400.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 11th day of February 2004 by Plaintiff and Defendant for Withdrawal of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of February 2004."
